references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This paper introduces latent diffusion models, which are foundational to many modern text-to-image and image editing techniques used in the CoSTA* agent.

references.paper_title: Learning transferable visual models from natural language supervision
references.reason: This paper is important because it introduces CLIP (Contrastive Language-Image Pre-training), a model used in the CoSTA* agent for subtask validation and assessing image-text alignment.

references.paper_title: YOLOv7: Trainable bag-of-freebies sets new state-of-the-art for real-time object detectors
references.reason: This paper introduces YOLOv7, an object detection model used within the CoSTA* agent as a tool for identifying objects in images during the editing process.
This paper is important because it introduces SAM, which is the foundation for object segmentation within the CoSTA* agent.
This paper introduces DALL-E, which are used for object replacement and editing in the CoSTA* framework and are an important tool leveraged.
